          <title>
            <string language="fr">Formation des ombres</string>
            <string language="en">Formation of shadows</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anordnung der Schatten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Formação das sombras</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione delle ombre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχηματισμός των σκιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Formación de sombras</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration prouve que les rayons de la lumière du soleil bloqués par l'arbre forment l'ombre de l'arbre.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that light rays from the Sun blocked by the tree form the shadow of the tree.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Lumière</string>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">rayons</string>
            <string language="en">rays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">ombre</string>
            <string language="en">shadow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">le soleil</string>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière du soleil</string>
            <string language="en">sunlight</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">arbre</string>
            <string language="en">tree</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß helle Strahlen von 
der Sonne durch das Baumformular den Schatten des Baums blockten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que os raios claros do 
sol obstruíram pelo formulário da árvore a sombra da árvore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che i raggi luminosi 
dal sole hanno ostruito dalla forma dell'albero l'ombra dell'albero.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι οι ελαφριές ακτίνες 
από τον ήλιο που εμποδίζεται από το δέντρο διαμορφώνουν τη σκιά
του δέντρου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que los rayos ligeros 
del sol bloquearon por la forma del árbol la sombra del árbol.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
